snippet: The university, which commissioned an investigation late last year into then-Coach Mike Rice’s behavior, announced a second inquiry and named an interim athletic director.
abstract: Rutgers announces that it will begin investigation into its men's basketball program and how it handled claims of abusive behavior by coach Mike Rice, who was fired.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER and ARIEL KAMINER

lead_paragraph: The university, which commissioned an investigation late last year into then-Coach Mike Rice’s behavior, announced a second inquiry and named an interim athletic director.

headline.seo: Rutgers to Commission Review of Basketball Scandal
headline.main: Rutgers Is Set to Investigate Basketball Program Again
headline.print_headline: A New Basketball Review at Rutgers

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
